info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 7 at 11:22AM CDT until June 8 at 7:00AM CDT by NWS Wichita KS
info.description:
...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Kansas...
Ninnescah South Fork near Murdock affecting Kingman County.
...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Kansas...
Chikaskia River near Corbin affecting Sumner County.
* WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast.
* WHERE...Ninnescah South Fork near Murdock.
* WHEN...Until tomorrow morning.
* IMPACTS...At 9.0 feet, Minor overflow occurs along both banks. However, on the south side of the banks near the river bridge on SE 160th Avenue, flooding spreads out into pastureland to the extent of 1000ft.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:00 AM CDT Saturday the stage was 8.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 9.0 feet this afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage this evening. - Flood stage is 8.0 feet.
info.instruction:
Do not drive into flooded areas or go around barricades. Nearly two feet of water will carry most vehicles away. Turn around, don't drown.
Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
The next statement will be issued this evening at 1130 PM CDT.

parameter.value: FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL TOMORROW MORNING
